casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jonathan Douglas RICHARDSON 272A14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 13, 2019

Paul M. Green, Attorney at Law, Durham, David Weiss, Attorney at Law, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, For Richardson, Jonathan Douglas

Gregory Butler, Paul Jackson, Assistant District Attorneys, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of February 2019 by Defendant-Appellant to Withdraw as Counsel and Allow the Appellate Defender to Appoint New Counsel:

*878"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of March 2019."
